Reviews.Content: It has the right price, size, weigth and cost, perfect in every way. I am so happy and I really recomend all of you to experience the new Blackberry Curve 9380.

Reviews.Title: Thanks for you responsability
Reviews.Author: Diego
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much my phone came in very good conditions in the estimated time, with all his accesories... five stars for you... i hope make others purchases in a future!

Reviews.Title: Black Berry Curve 9380
Reviews.Author: Maria Allen
Reviews.Content: Excelente teléfono, Muy cómodo, rápido, liviano y bonito. Funciona muy bien con Movistar. Poca memoria para aplicaciones, lo cual para mi no es un problema. Imágenes muy 'nítidas. Pantalla bastante sensible que abre muy rápidamente los enlaces. Lo recomiendo !

Reviews.Title: buen celular
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: vlio la pena la compra me gusto adaptado a mi necesidad levanta 3g en venezuela funciona con la 3 operadoras del pais movilnet movistar y digitel lo recomiendo 100% desde guarenas venezuela

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: RCPG
Reviews.Content: The product is excellent. Very happy with what was received. Many people who have taught you want to buy a cell phone is slim and very comfortable to wear. Functions very good, quick, handy, the touch pad is very comfortable. It's definitely very good phone.

Reviews.Title: Not an iPhone
Reviews.Author: Marcello
Reviews.Content: is good cellphone but not is the best and if not connected to internet all the time is a regular phone.The battery life is 1 day the operating system is old but is okay.

Reviews.Title: Very Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Shira-Lee Brewley
Reviews.Content: Ordered this phone for someone as a gift. It stated new and when they got it the charger was not working and the phone looked used. Never again!

Reviews.Title: 24/7 perfume
Reviews.Author: shirley omatseye
Reviews.Content: I chose it bcos I have used it before, so I am only replacing it, cos I so love it

Reviews.Title: My purchase
Reviews.Author: aries
Reviews.Content: It took a bit long to get to me but I guess it's because of the distance where it is coming from but I was satisfied with the product. Have to see if it works for international use.

Reviews.Title: worst buy ever
Reviews.Author: jay
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone, took forever to get here, when it did arrive and i placed my simcard in it the next wk or so after it started freezing up so i took it off and left it off for a few wks, the battery died so now am trying to charge it n it isn't taking any charge even left it on d charger 4 a few hrs and still nothing...plz dnt purchase this phone from this seller and am scared i don't get back my money if i send it back

Reviews.Title: Decent
Reviews.Author: Pauly S.
Reviews.Content: So this is pretty much the 2011 introduced BlackBerry Curve 9360; almost identical without the keyboard. No gorilla glass, just hard plastic for the touch screen. Touch response isn't great, and it's nothing near the responsiveness and crispness of the iPhone (an old 3GS has a better response time than this) or high end Android phones. If you have big fingers, I don't recommend this phone. You also can't tilt lock the screen either.The OS is better than BB OS 6 but no where near up to par for 2013; OS 7 can be sluggish. Apps are at a minimal.Design is great. It's piano black, tiny, razor thin and gotta love that red blinking notification light. Email delivery blows iPhone and Android out of the water as well security (it's almost unbreakable and messages are encrypted). Camera is pretty good. Besides that, there's no reason to get this phone for over $250. If you are looking for a secure phone with good email, go with a keyboard OS 7 BlackBerry like the Bold 9900 or the new BlackBerry Z10. They actually did an awesome job with the Z10.

Reviews.Title: good product and good price , no problems until now
Reviews.Author: Rene Ramos
Reviews.Content: good product, I have some issue with the sign but this a communication network issueNow lets see if the perfomance is acceptable

Reviews.Title: Exactly the phone I need

Reviews.Content: I like blackberries, and this one was in excellent price. It was shipped fast and on time. the GSM works perfectly in other countries. Just be aware that this kind of blackberry is little slow when you use features, but it is from company, all do the same.I love Curves

Reviews.Title: very important

Reviews.Title: Battery issues
Reviews.Author: Ser
Reviews.Content: The battery issues I have with this phone make it almost unusable.  After I charge it completely and start using it, the battery heats to extreme temperatures and then all the power is drained out.  A full charge lasts me literally 2 hours.  I bought the item with "no warranty" but didn't expect the seller to sell something in this condition.  Unsatisfied.  Will go back to ebay.com where I NEVER had any issues.  So long Amazon!

Reviews.Title: especificaciones del equipo

Reviews.Content: Good night:interezada'm buying the team, is asked whether to Venezuela in the specifications if the computer registers with 1,2,5,6 bands that you can see in the team's options where it says about us as we have 3 operators telephone and with this specification would make your purchase. waiting for your feedback. sara greetings.
